column1: 394299,Wood Model Maker,,"Measure dimensions of completed products or work pieces to verify conformance to specifications
column7: Shape surfaces or edges of wood work pieces
column9: Trim excess material from work pieces
column13: Study blueprints or other instructions to determine equipment setup requirements
column17: Set equipment controls to meet cutting specifications
column19: Measure materials to mark reference points, cutting lines or other indicators
column25: Mark products, work pieces or equipment with identifying information
column27: Draw guide lines or markings on materials or work pieces using patterns or other references
column29: Assemble machine tools, parts or fixtures
column33: Construct patterns, templates or other work aids
